page.title: 06HEALTH CENTRE AT HATFIELD
page.content: HATFIELD HEALTH CENTRE WAS ESTABLISHED ON JUNE 17 1974. IT IS OWNED BY THE AREA HEALTH AUTHORITY AND RENTED BY DOCTORS. MANY DIFFERENT PEOPLE WORK THERE INCLUDING: RECEPTION STAFF, CLEANERS, A SECRETARY, MIDWIFE, SOCIAL WORKER, 5 DOCTORS, AND MANY NURES. A CHIROPODIST COMES IN ONCE A WEEK. AT THE CENTRE 12,500 PEOPLE ARE REGISTERED. 1000 PATIENTS ATTEND EVERY WEEK,GENERALLY WITH SORE THROATS AND COLDS. SURGERY HOURS ARE FROM 8.30pm TO 6.00pm.THE CENTRE HAS EQUIPMENT FOR TESTING BLOOD,HEART,LUNGS,& HEARING. THE FOLLOWING CLINICS ARE INCLUDED: IMMUNISATION,ANTENATAL,INFANT WELFARE. A PHARMACY IS ATTACHED FOR AQUISITION OF DRUGS. SIMPLE OPERATIONS SUCH AS INGROWING TOENAILS ARE DONE, COMPLEX OPERATIONS ARE REFERED TO DONCASTER ROYAL INFIRMARY.
